description: Juicy cherries, gooey chocolate and crunchy biscuits, this black forest tiffin slice ticks all the boxes. Make it ahead for an afternoon snack or dessert.
name: Black Forest Cherry Tiffin Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Grease a 20cm (7cm deep) square cake pan. Line base and sides with baking paper.

Reserve 1/2 cup cherries. Place remaining cherries with biscuits and juice in a large snap-lock bag. Using a rolling pin, break mixture into small pieces. Transfer to a bowl, reserving 1 cup of the biscuit mixture.

Place choc melts and butter in a microwave-safe bowl. Microwave, uncovered, on medium for 2 minutes, stirring with a metal spoon every 30 seconds, or until melted and smooth. Add chocolate mixture to biscuit mixture in bowl and stir to combine. Press mixture over base of pan.

Halve reserved cherries. Combine dark chocolate and oil in a bowl. Pour dark chocolate mixture over slice, spreading to cover, then scatter with reserved biscuit mixture, white chocolate and halved cherries. Refrigerate for 2 hours or overnight, if time permits, until firm. Cut into squares to serve.
